svg.title: Testcase for repaint of the area previously covered by a foreignObject
svg.script: // The green rect is initially covered by the red div. After the div // has rendered the foreignObject (and thus div) is moved out // of the viewport which should then be filled by the green rect as a result. function startTest() { document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", doTest, false); // in case we're not gecko setTimeout(doTest, 5000); } function doTest() { document.getElementById('fo').setAttribute('y', '100%'); document.documentElement.removeAttribute('class'); }
